nodes.documentation: Library to handle fee discount calculation
nodes.name: LibDiscount
getHotBalance

nodes.documentation:
Calculate and return the rate at which fees will be charged for an address. The discounted
rate depends on how much HOT token is owned by the user. Values returned will be a percentage
used to calculate how much of the fee is paid, so a return value of 100 means there is 0
discount, and a return value of 70 means a 30% rate reduction.
     * The discountConfig is defined as such:
╔═══════════════════╤════════════════════════════════════════════╗
║                   │ length(bytes)   desc                       ║
╟───────────────────┼────────────────────────────────────────────╢
║ count             │ 1               the count of configs       ║
║ maxDiscountedRate │ 1               the max discounted rate    ║
║ config            │ 5 each                                     ║
╚═══════════════════╧════════════════════════════════════════════╝
     * The default discount structure as defined in code would give the following result:
     * Fee discount table
╔════════════════════╤══════════╗
║     HOT BALANCE    │ DISCOUNT ║
╠════════════════════╪══════════╣
║     0 <= x < 10000 │     0%   ║
╟────────────────────┼──────────╢
║ 10000 <= x < 20000 │    10%   ║
╟────────────────────┼──────────╢
║ 20000 <= x < 30000 │    20%   ║
╟────────────────────┼──────────╢
║ 30000 <= x < 40000 │    30%   ║
╟────────────────────┼──────────╢
║ 40000 <= x         │    40%   ║
╚════════════════════╧══════════╝
     * Breaking down the bytes of 0x043c000027106400004e205a000075305000009c404600000000000000000000
     * 0x  04           3c          0000271064  00004e205a  0000753050  00009c4046  0000000000  0000000000;
    ~~           ~~          ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~
     |            |               |           |           |           |           |           |
   count  maxDiscountedRate       1           2           3           4           5           6
     * The first config breaks down as follows:  00002710   64
                                          ~~~~~~~~   ~~
                                              |      |
                                             bar    rate
     * Meaning if a user has less than 10000 (0x00002710) HOT, they will pay 100%(0x64) of the
standard fee.
     * @param user The user address to calculate a fee discount for.
@return The percentage of the regular fee this user will pay.
nodes.name: getDiscountedRate

nodes.documentation:
Owner can modify discount configuration.
     * @param newConfig A data blob representing the new discount config. Details on format above.
nodes.name: changeDiscountConfig

nodes.documentation: Library to handle fee discount calculation

getHotBalance

nodes.documentation:
Calculate and return the rate at which fees will be charged for an address. The discounted
rate depends on how much HOT token is owned by the user. Values returned will be a percentage
used to calculate how much of the fee is paid, so a return value of 100 means there is 0
discount, and a return value of 70 means a 30% rate reduction.

║                   │ length(bytes)   desc                       ║
╟───────────────────┼────────────────────────────────────────────╢

║ config            │ 5 each                                     ║

║     HOT BALANCE    │ DISCOUNT ║
╠════════════════════╪══════════╣
║     0 <= x < 10000 │     0%   ║
╟────────────────────┼──────────╢
║ 10000 <= x < 20000 │    10%   ║
╟────────────────────┼──────────╢
║ 20000 <= x < 30000 │    20%   ║
╟────────────────────┼──────────╢
║ 30000 <= x < 40000 │    30%   ║
╟────────────────────┼──────────╢
║ 40000 <= x         │    40%   ║
╚════════════════════╧══════════╝

standard fee.

@return The percentage of the regular fee this user will pay.

nodes.documentation:
Owner can modify discount configuration.
     * @param newConfig A data blob representing the new discount config. Details on format above.
nodes.name: changeDiscountConfig

params.newConfig: A data blob representing the new discount config. Details on format above.

params.user: The user address to calculate a fee discount for.

getDiscountedRate(address).return: The percentage of the regular fee this user will pay.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

getDiscountedRate(address).notice: Calculate and return the rate at which fees will be charged for an address. The discounted rate depends on how much HOT token is owned by the user.    ~~           ~~          ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~  ~~~~~~~~~~     |            |               |           |           |           |           |           |   count  maxDiscountedRate       1           2           3           4           5           6     * The first config breaks down as follows:  00002710   64                                          ~~~~~~~~   ~~                                              |      |                                             bar    rate     * Meaning if a user has less than 10000 (0x00002710) HOT, they will pay 100%(0x64) of the standard fee.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing to ownership will leave the contract without an owner. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.
